channel.title: Comments on: Your Own Personal Butler in an Alarm Clock

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description:
I can't find any for sale either. You might try contacting some of the reviewers on Amazon to see if they are bored with their clocks and to sell it to you. http://www.amazon.com/Stephen-Talking-Voco-Alarm-Clock/product-reviews/B004GBGDVE/ref=dp_top_cm_cr_acr_txt?showViewpoints=1
Also according to this thread there are some of the MP3s available from the alarm clock that you could probably load into an MP3 alarm clock like one of these http://www.amazon.com/s/?_encoding=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=390957&linkCode=ur2&pageMinusResults=1&suo=1383406668027&tag=thebloofrushe-20&url=search-alias%3Daps#/ref=nb_sb_ss_i_0_7?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=mp3%20alarm%20clock&sprefix=mp3+ala%2Caps%2C205&rh=i%3Aaps%2Ck%3Amp3%20alarm%20clock&sepatfbtf=true&tc=1383406671005
http://ask.metafilter.com/240423/Where-can-I-buy-the-tracks-from-Stephen-Frys-Voco-alarm-clock
item.content:encoded:
I can’t find any for sale either. You might try contacting some of the reviewers on Amazon to see if they are bored with their clocks and to sell it to you. http://www.amazon.com/Stephen-.....ewpoints=1

Also according to this thread there are some of the MP3s available from the alarm clock that you could probably load into an MP3 alarm clock like one of these http://www.amazon.com/s/?_enco.....3406671005

http://ask.metafilter.com/2404.....larm-clock

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Who is Stephen Fry? For shame! You probably know him best from his role in V for Vendetta, but he is otherwise known as Hugh Laurie's insanely awesome former collaborator, actor, filmmaker, etc. He is basically awesome.
item.content:encoded: Who is Stephen Fry? For shame! You probably know him best from his role in V for Vendetta, but he is otherwise known as Hugh Laurie’s insanely awesome former collaborator, actor, filmmaker, etc. He is basically awesome.
